meanings.definition: Of or relating to a prefix.
meanings.sent1: The prefixal letters were added to the beginning of the word.
meanings.sent2: In English, prefixal words often change the meaning of the base word.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's prefixal explanation made the lesson easier to understand.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a prefixal touch that transformed the situation.
meanings.sent5: The prefixal color coding system helped organize the files efficiently.

meanings.definition: Having the nature of a prefix.
meanings.sent1: The prefixal rules determine how words are formed.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the prefixal structure of words can improve vocabulary skills.
meanings.sent3: The prefixal puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: His leadership style had a prefixal influence on the team.
meanings.sent5: The prefixal patterns in the language were fascinating to study.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a prefix.
meanings.sent1: The prefixal changes made the word easier to pronounce.
meanings.sent2: Learning about prefixal meanings can help decipher unfamiliar words.
meanings.sent3: The prefixal decorations on the cake were a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: His actions had a prefixal impact on the outcome of the project.
meanings.sent5: The prefixal elements in the design added a unique flair to the product.
